alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 10:01AM CDT until August 08 at 1:22PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River near Eureka. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Bourbeuse River at Union. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.2 feet, Hunters Ford Road is closed near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and crest near 21.5 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Eureka 19.0 16.3 20.3 21.5 19.1 13.4 10.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
